messages.auth.registration.correct: The user {{username}} has been correctly registered
messages.auth.logout: The user has logged out from the app
messages.auth.login.correct: The user has been correctly logged in

errorMessages.auth.user.not.found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
errorMessages.auth.wrong.password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
errorMessages.auth.argument.error: signInWithEmailAndPassword failed: First argument 'email' must be a valid string.
errorMessages.auth.invalid.email: The email address is badly formatted.
errorMessages.auth.weak.password: Password should be at least 6 characters long.
errorMessages.denied.access.title: Denied access.
errorMessages.denied.access.message: You don't have permission to access {{resource}} on this server.
errorMessages.no.items.found: No items found for this category.
